sentences.sentence: As I wrote above, your role model ACTS as a pacer.

sentences.sentence: One day he noticed a crumpled Piper Tri-Pacer at the end of Mr. Cook's grass airstrip.
sentences.translation: 一天他注意到库克草地跑道的尽头有一架扭曲的Piper Tri-Pacer飞机。

sentences.sentence: Use ea pacer like a or your finger--as a focal point to draw your eye across the line or down the page.
